name: Planet Conquest
description:
An award winning gamejam game from the start of 2018, where the theme was “Empire/Rebellion”. You play as an empire ship, and the goal is to capture all the planets while shooting down the rebellion ships defending them. Capture all 9 before they defeat you to win.

Made with a team of 5 students over 2 days.

Instructions:

Move around with the arrow keys and hold space to shoot
